title: Skins that'll probably never happen
body:
I'm bored so I started making up crazy ideas for skins that'll probably never happen.
Here we go:

French Maid Urgot
Star Guardian Yorrick
Pool Party Brand
Dragon Trainer Shyvanna
PROJECT: Udyr
Heartseeker Cho'gath
Salaryman Fizz
Good Girl Jinx
Surprise Party Shaco
Kitty Rengar
Dark Star Veigar
Super Galaxy Volibear
Winter Forest Zyra

Got any ones that evoke strange or epic imagery? Let's share our crazy ideas, something stupid or clever or both.

replies.body: I kinda want to see a pair skin set for Zilean and Ekko, like back to the future themed as the doc and marty.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=qnApA3gw,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-08-05T06:16:29.789+0000)
>
> I kinda want to see a pair skin set for Zilean and Ekko, like back to the future themed as the doc and marty.

yes. Yes! **YES!**
For the love of Marc Merrill please do this!
Kitty kat rengar COME ON RIOT

Manbearpig sejuani

Trollface blitz or trundle

Infernal teemo (that would literally sell millions - you're welcome riot).

Shyvanna the racist dragon

Nba ryze (probably better with his old kit)

Potato syndra
How bout Ranga Thresh with the stealing souls n' stuff

Darth Veiger

Chewdyr (Wookie Udyr)

Jedi Yi

Tahm the Hutt

Storm Trooper Lucian (Or Finn... just saying :P )

Jar Jar Nasus

Obi-Lee Sinobi

Yasuo Skywalker

Forsaken Jayce and Chosen Master Yi represent the Star wars franchise, with Yi being Luke Skywalker and Jayce being Darth Vadar

Infernal nami.

What what pantheon.

Fhrit rengar

This is one I'm actually surprised they haven't done yet and I think would be a super cool skin idea:

Pool Party Illaoi

Is your mind blown yet?
Jazz Master Jhin and Swing master Swain?
